name: Heirs’ Property Relending Program
objective: As specified in 7 U.S.C. 1936c(c),  HPRP provides loan funds to intermediaries who will re-lend loan funds to individuals and entities with undivided ownership interests in order to resolve ownership and succession issues relating to a farm owned in common by multiple owners.
assistance_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
